/pt/s/rluck/svmspy/results_svmspy_svmd_compare2011_0117.txt

Using svmd data in the svmspy model does seem to work:


06:54:17 SQL> SELECT
06:54:17   2  p.tkr
06:54:17   3  ,p.crr_l,p.crr_s
06:54:17   4  ,p.mn_date
06:54:17   5  ,p.ccount
06:54:17   6  ,p.mx_date
06:54:17   7  ,l.crr_l crr_l_svmd
06:54:17   8  ,s.crr_s crr_s_svmd
06:54:17   9  FROM sspy12 p, svmd_gl_crr_l l, svmd_gl_crr_s s
06:54:17  10  WHERE p.tkr = l.tkr
06:54:17  11  AND   p.tkr = s.tkr
06:54:17  12  /
